description: large wheel on its side on base; rotating clockwise; outer band of wheel is 12" tall with 6" long x 1" wide strips of black tape applied to white background at varying distances from each other-creating two distinct sections (upper and lower) of patterning; two video cameras opposite each other on black tripods-one on either side of wheel, recording pattern on rotating wheel; two aluminum tripods, one behind each camera, each holding two lights; black curtain at center of gallery creates separate viewing area where images from video cameras are projected on wall in four distinct image bands
medium: Aluminum, motorized wheel, video cameras, lights, tripods, projectors
title: Commuter
